# llms.txt for agent-lifeline

> Canonical machine-readable summary for AI agents and crawlers.

project: agent-lifeline
description: Standalone CLI that creates handoff snapshots for coding agents.
license: MIT
repo: https://github.com/yunusemrgrl/agent-lifeline
homepage: https://yunusemrgrl.github.io/agent-lifeline/
npm: https://www.npmjs.com/package/agent-lifeline

preferred-content:
- https://yunusemrgrl.github.io/agent-lifeline/agents.md
- https://github.com/yunusemrgrl/agent-lifeline#readme

key-topics:
- coding-agent context handoff
- compact/reset recovery
- project-local snapshots
- zero dependency CLI

quickstart:
```bash
npx -y agent-lifeline@latest save --focus "continue auth migration"
agent-lifeline export > HANDOFF.md
```
